name: Hills Escape India - 2d Racing Game
description:
Face the challenges of unique Indian theme based hill climbing environments with many different Indian cars and bike with original engine sounds. 

collect coins to upgrade your car and reach different levels. game Contains many different Indian city based level and of one of this level based on covid-19 theme with background sound.

and another level is dedicated to Indian art and cultures.

Features-:

. Offline - Play whenever & wherever

. Vehicles - Unlock many different Indian cars

. More than 15+ Indian cars and bikes with original engine sounds

. All the levels is based on Indian theme

. Play with Indian cartoon character

. Indian theme based background music 

. Level 10 is especially based on corona virus condition of Indian with precaution sign board in the level

. Level 10 contains covid-19 theme based background music

. Last level of the game is dedicated to Indian art and culture. longest level of the game   

. And many levels dedicated to Indian states or city's and their different culture 

Vehicles: Thar, bolero, Fortuner, Pajero, truck, taxi, JCB, auto, KTM bike, royal Enfield, TVS Luna, SUV, Maruti 800 and many more!
